name: An Orcaward Tale
description:
A long long time ago in the fantasy land of youtube, A small channel did a giveaway. Folks received prizes for many things.... but there was one thing that stood out above all the rest. A Cringy Fanfiction based on a boy and his puppet. As much as the Boy hated the story (and eventually the puppet) he couldn't escape it. 

Secret meetings were held in the discord of doom. Evil plans and Giggles would echo in the night as the goblins of discord weaved an evil game that would haunt that boy's nightmares.

One Rule about Secret game club was... You do not speak about Secret game club around the boy.

After months of work, the goblins emerged from their discord carrying a pretty package. They held it up to the boy. Before he could open it the goblins asked only one thing...

 Live stream it...

This is that game.

If you make a video with this game please send me a link! We can share it with the Boy to keep this nightmare going. #orcawardtale

I am also open to other ideas for more endings ~evil smirk~
